summary: Provides a command‑line utility that assembles information about the available Diffusers pipelines, formats it into a structured table, and uploads the resulting metadata files to the Hugging Face hub repository for Diffusers.
business_intent: Automate the maintenance of up‑to‑date pipeline metadata so that developers and end‑users can reliably discover supported image‑to‑image, in‑painting, and text‑to‑image pipelines within the Diffusers ecosystem.
